task.summary:
Refactor IntelliJ configuration files
Deleted obsolete .idea files and replaced them with new module and workspace settings. Updated vcs.xml configuration to fix Git directory mapping.

Add package.json for Rust Tauri project
Introduce essential scripts and devDependency to support development, build, and preview commands using Vite and Tauri. This setup also includes the archiver library to handle packaging tasks.

Remove package-lock.json from rust-actix template
Deleted the package-lock.json file from the rust-actix template. This change helps prevent issues related to package version locking and ensures dependencies are dynamically resolved.

Add Node.js Core to IntelliJ and update workspace settings
Introduced a new jsLibraryMappings.xml to include Node.js Core. Updated workspace.xml to refine project settings, enable PUSH_AUTO_UPDATE, and add new configuration components. Adjusted existing comments and removed obsolete paths.

Update IntelliJ workspace settings
Added multiple new project configuration paths and updated the last opened file path to reflect the current project structure. Enhanced task tracking by including recent updates and changes in the workspace. These modifications ensure better integration and configuration management for the project's IntelliJ setup.

Remove obsolete script files and add `dev.js`.
Deleted `app.js`, `publish.js`, and `run.js` as they are no longer needed. Introduced `dev.js` to handle the process management for the new development workflow.

Update Vite server config and build output directory
Changed the server configuration to use host mode and set the port to 3000. Added HMR settings to improve development experience. Updated the build output directory to "target/wwwroot".

Refactor npm scripts structure
Reorganized npm scripts for better readability and consistency. Replaced some hyphenated script names, removed unused scripts, and streamlined the development process by consolidating duplicate functionalities. This makes maintenance easier and aligns with project naming conventions.

Add new dependencies to Cargo.toml
Added `walkdir`, `awc`, and `log` to runtime dependencies. Also included `walkdir` and `npm_rs` to build dependencies for enhanced functionality. These changes aim to extend the capabilities of the `rust-actix` template.

Add proxy setup for Vite dev server and improve logging
Replaced `println!` with `log::info` for improved logging clarity. Implemented `proxy_to_vite` function for forwarding requests to the Vite development server in development mode and adjusted routing to conditionally handle requests based on the build configuration. Adjusted error handling and streamlined inclusion of the `index.html` file.

Refactor build script to use npm_rs and enhance directory setup
Replaced usage of std::process::Command with npm_rs for cleaner npm script execution. Added logic for creating required directories and monitoring source file changes to trigger rebuilds.

Deleted obsolete .idea files and replaced them with new module and workspace settings. Updated vcs.xml configuration to fix Git directory mapping.

Add package.json for Rust Tauri project
Introduce essential scripts and devDependency to support development, build, and preview commands using Vite and Tauri. This setup also includes the archiver library to handle packaging tasks.
